text:
Service Change  Posted: 07/08/2018  4:42PM

Southbound [2] and [3] trains are running local from 96 St toÂ Times Sq-42 St because of a passenger in need of medical assistance at 72 St.

Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | 11:30 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
No [2] trains between Franklin Av and Flatbush Av in Brooklyn

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[2] service operates between Gun Hill Rd/241 St* and Franklin Av, and via the [4] local to/from Utica Av.

[SB] Buses operate between Franklin Av and Flatbush Av, making stops at Nostrand Av,
President St, Sterling St, Winthrop St, Church Av, Beverly Rd and Newkirk Av.

• Transfer between trains and [SB] buses at Franklin Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 3:45 AM Sat, Jul 7 to 10 PM Sun, Jul 8

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[SB] Buses operate between Gun Hill Rd and 241 St, stopping at 219, 225, 233 Sts, and Nereid Av.

• Transfer between trains and [SB] buses at Gun Hill Rd.
